divs: Sighting DetailsOn August 13th at 10:30pm I walked into my upstairs bed room and my attention was immediately drawn to my bedroom window. There was an extremely bright star like object hovering and slowly moving left to right in my field of view. I called my wife to the window to make sure I was actually seeing what I had been seeing. Together we watched the object for about 3 more minutes as it changed shape and color several times as we watched. After about 3 min the object changed into more of a solid orb shape and started heading to the sout
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Colfax
There were no other sightings in Colfax on or around August 13th 2013
Summary: star like object seen changing shape and hovering
